title: Midtown Scavenger Hunt
shortDescription: Explore the hidden gems of Midtown with this exciting scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: This scavenger hunt takes you through the vibrant Midtown area, highlighting art installations, historic landmarks, and local favorites.

missions.title: Art Installation
missions.shortDescription: Visit the famous art installation between two office buildings.
missions.hint: Hint: Look for the sculpture inspired by nature.

missions.title: Historic Landmark
missions.shortDescription: Discover the landmark building that shaped Midtown's skyline.
missions.hint: Hint: It’s the tallest building in the area.

missions.title: Local Cafe
missions.shortDescription: End your hunt with a stop at a local favorite cafe.
missions.hint: Hint: The cafe’s name rhymes with ‘mocha’.
